bdi4jade.goal

Class BeliefValueGoal<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.goal.BeliefGoal
      • bdi4jade.goal.BeliefValueGoal<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the belief value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Goal, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeliefSetValueGoal

    public class BeliefValueGoal<T>
extends BeliefGoal
    This class represents the goal of an agent to believe in a certain belief with an specific value, that is, the agent has a belief whose name and value are specified in this goal.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeliefValueGoal

        public BeliefValueGoal(java.lang.String beliefName,
               T value)
        Creates a new BeliefValueGoal with the provided belief name and a value. This value represents the value that is aimed to be associated with the belief.
        Parameters:
        beliefName - the belief name.
        value - the value that is target of this goal.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public T getValue()
        The belief value associated with this goal.
        Returns:
        the belief value.

      • isAchieved

        public boolean isAchieved(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Checks whether this goal is achieved by verifying if the provided belief has the value specified in this goal.
        Overrides:
        isAchieved in class BeliefGoal
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the belief has the value specified in this goal, false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this goal, in the form "BeliefValueGoal: BELIEF NAME should be BELIEF VALUE".
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        the string representation of this belief value goal.
